channel.title: CVE Feed for Summar Software -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Summar Software -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-5675|2024-06-06T12:10:04.124Z -- summar%20software -- mentor%20%E2%80%93%20employee%20portal
item.description: Untrusted data deserialization vulnerability has been found in Mentor - Employee Portal, affecting version 3.83.35. This vulnerability could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code, by injecting a malicious payload into the “ViewState” field.
